Title: Relates to the sentencing for the crime of aggravated cruelty to animals
Summary: Enacts "Tucker's law"; removes the provision that provides that any term of imprisonment for a violation of aggravated cruelty to animals may not exceed two years.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to sentencing for the crime of aggravated cruelty to animals
